text: int main ( ) { int n , i , j , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < k ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i + 1 ; j ++ ) if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] >= a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; else a [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
